Portal 2 is one of my favorite games, been playing it for years. It never gets old. 
The characters, storyline and gameplay are just fantastic. I've shared many laughs with this game as well. Each time I play it, I swear I find something new. I highly recommend this masterpiece to people who love puzzles and a great story.

I think this game is a classic! I read the other day that the characters showcase moral grayness, they aren't just "good" or "evil". I've played this game through several times and have enjoyed it each and every time. I enjoy the characters and the game mechanics. It's also fairly clean with just a small amount of language, so it can be recommended to many ages
Tavsiye ederim

I'm a bit tires and hungry. The Mrs. is grabbing some food. Wonder what she's getting? Ooh! Maybe some fried chicken! Then again I had Flippin Good today. Do you know what Flippin Good is? It's this country-themed Chicken Sandwich place over on Fremont Street and Las Vegas Blvd. I got their Nashville Hot sandwich and that was pretty good, but if I knew it came hotter before I ordered, I would've goten THAT. Anyways, their fries were slightly bland at first, but one bite of that Nashville Hot and everything in that To-Go box was just heightened. Me, I like spicy, and though this wasn't as hot as I hoped, it was a great investment. Most likely gonna eat their hottest and leave a review on that sandwich over on a Civ 6 review.

Portal 2 is one of the greatest puzzle games I've ever played. It offers a hilarious and amazing single player campaign, while also bringing an equally mind stumping two player cooperative mode so you AND a buddy can run around in a circle for hours trying to figure out how to get a door open. In short, Portal 2 is definitely still a whole lot of fun, even 8 years later.
